nodes.bodyText: since it is not used anywhere but getReplicaSetUrl, WDYT about removing the field and adding an overloaded getReplicaSetUrl(String) method?

It might be puzzling for users who are used to Testcontainers’ with… methods to create containers. However, given the rare case when a user needs to specify a MongoDB database name for testing, we can go with your solution, I’ll adjust changes.
